login.title: Login into {brand}
login.description:
To access to your {brand} account, you will need to do the following steps in a browser that can use DevTools:

1. Open this [link]({oauth_url}) and login with your account.
2. After login, click on "Ok" button.
	If the {brand} app gets opened, uninstall it temporary.
3. Open the console in DevTools and look for an error message saying "Failed to launch '`{redirect_uri}?code=xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx...`' because the scheme does not have a registered handler".
4. Copy the url into the field.
